name: CatCatch (itch)
description:
Cat Catch is a simple android game, just move the cats with your finger, find the one that corresponds with the movement and press its tile. If you found the real cat, the game advances to the next level, if not - game over.

Currently there are  only 20 levels.

This is my first decent android game, so it would be really helpful if you could leave some feedback.
